About Description: I’m Mohammad Irfan Noorzada, a self-taught, creative and dedicated Full-Stack Web Developer focused on building modern, high-performance websites and web applications. I specialize in the MERN stack and love turning ideas into clean, functional, and visually appealing digital experiences. My goal is to craft websites that not only look great but also perform flawlessly, helping brands and individuals grow in the digital world.
FAQ1Title: How long will it take to build my website?
FAQ1Description: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A simple site can take 1–2 weeks, while a full-featured site may take 4–6 weeks. I provide a clear schedule upfront at every stage to ensure deadlines are met.
FAQ2Title: How much does it cost to build a website?
FAQ2Description: The cost depends on your requirements, type of website, features, and complexity. I offer transparent pricing after discussing your project, and I provide high-quality results that give value for your investment, so you know exactly what you’re paying for.
FAQ3Title: Can you make my website mobile-friendly?
FAQ3Description: Absolutely! Every website I build is fully responsive, ensuring it looks and works perfectly on desktops, tablets, and smartphones. I test across multiple devices and screen sizes to guarantee a seamless user experience.
FAQ4Title: Will I be able to update my website myself?
FAQ4Description: Yes! I provide an easy-to-use CMS integration (if needed), and I also offer a short tutorial or guide so you can manage your content without needing a developer for small updates.
FAQ5Title: What if I need support after the website is live?
FAQ5Description: I provide professional website support and maintenance packages. Whether it’s fixing bugs, adding features, or updating content, I’m available to ensure your website continues to run smoothly and securely.
